intro: you are in a museum like room with 3 statues and a locked door on the other side of the room and a table next to you

magnifying glass.statue 1: you use the magnifying glass to see that it has the number 1 on it
magnifying glass.statue 2: you use the magnifying glass to see that it has the number 4 on it
magnifying glass.statue 3: you use the magnifying glass to see that it has the number 3 on it

interactions.statue 1: it is a statue of a person but you don't know how
interactions.statue 2: it is a statue of a person but you don't know how
interactions.statue 3: it is a statue of a person but you don't know how
interactions.table: it has a magnifying glass on it
interactions.door: the door has a keycode on it it requires 3 numbers
